feature1.title: Heat Recovery 1
feature1.description: This feature provides heat recovery for tap water, allowing energy savings and efficiency improvements.

feature2.title: Heat Recovery 2
feature2.description: This feature recovers heat for space heating applications, reducing overall energy consumption.

feature3.title: High Pressure Side
feature3.description: Supports operation at 120 or 130 bar for high-pressure applications.

feature4.title: Air Conditioning Flooded
feature4.description: Optimized air conditioning solutions using a flooded system.
